channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 亚利桑那州独立参议员 Kyrsten Sinema 宣布将在今年任期结束时退休
item.description:
Sen. Kyrsten Sinema, an Arizona independent, announces she will retire at the end of her term this year https://t.co/LAUnz9prxN

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 由于公司所谓的 "技术问题"，包括 Facebook 和 Instagram 在内的 Meta 平台于周二对数千名用户造成了影响。
item.description:
Meta’s platforms, including Facebook and Instagram, went down for thousands of users on Tuesday, because of what the company called a “technical issue" https://t.co/7l3QHXmZ3s

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 母公司 Meta 表示，Facebook、Instagram 和 Threads 正在经历大面积故障
item.description:
Facebook, Instagram and Threads are experiencing widespread outages, parent company Meta says https://t.co/12M36fTLYP

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 底特律北部发生大火，火势蔓延至一英里之外，官员称有一人在大火中丧生
item.description:
One person was killed in a towering fire north of Detroit that sent debris as far as a mile away, officials say https://t.co/D6e6WWjZ5B

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，前总统唐纳德-特朗普将赢得北达科他州的共和党总统党团会议，这是在 "超级星期二 "竞选活动扩大到 15 个州之前的最后一次助选。
item.description:
Former President Donald Trump will win North Dakota’s Republican presidential caucuses, CNN projects, claiming one final boost before the campaign expands to 15 states on Super Tuesday. https://t.co/cT8EIhfqbN

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在拜登政府提出紧急请求后，最高法院暂时冻结了得克萨斯州有争议的移民法的执行
item.description:
Supreme Court temporarily freezes enforcement of Texas' controversial immigration law after the Biden administration filed an emergency request https://t.co/wb2CHgMr2u

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 一位高级官员说，一个联合国小组发现了 "明确而令人信服的信息"，加沙的一些人质遭受了性暴力侵害
item.description:
A United Nations team found "clear and convincing information" that some hostages in Gaza were subjected to sexual violence, a top official says https://t.co/ASqh8rzNBR

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 杰森-凯尔斯（Jason Kelce）宣布从美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）退役。这位明星中锋的整个职业生涯都在费城老鹰队度过，并在 2018 年赢得了超级碗。
item.description:
Jason Kelce announces his retirement from the NFL. The star center spent his entire career with the Philadelphia Eagles and won a Super Bowl in 2018. https://t.co/xVu4VSl4Nw

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在美国最高法院推翻 "罗伊诉韦德 "案的推动下，法国成为第一个将堕胎权写入宪法的国家
item.description:
France becomes the first country to enshrine abortion rights in its constitution, a move prompted by the US Supreme Court's overturning of Roe v. Wadehttps://t.co/A4WYamY6c0

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 苹果因阻止竞争对手的音乐流媒体服务告知 iPhone 用户更便宜的订阅选择而被欧盟罚款 20 亿美元
item.description:
Apple fined $2 billion in EU for preventing rival music streaming services from telling iPhone users about cheaper subscription options https://t.co/BH5O04IyKF

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，尼基-黑利将在华盛顿特区的共和党总统初选中获胜。这是她在共和党初选中首次战胜领跑者唐纳德-特朗普。
item.description:
Nikki Haley will win the Republican presidential primary in Washington, DC, CNN projects. It's her first victory of the GOP primary over front-runner Donald Trump. https://t.co/dDY2T2eTst

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 4, 2024

item.title: 编者注：上一篇文章已删除，本篇报道已更新，更正了有关得分记录的信息。

item.title: 爱荷华大学的凯特琳-克拉克（Caitlin Clark）超越皮特-马拉维奇（Pete Maravich），成为美国大学生篮球联赛（NCAA）一级联盟男子和女子篮球队的历史得分王。
item.description:
Iowa's Caitlin Clark becomes the NCAA Division I's all-time leading scorer for men's and women's basketball, surpassing Pete Maravich. https://t.co/gr5fqXB3wA

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 3, 2024

item.title: 谢赫巴兹-谢里夫（Shehbaz Sharif）在大选近一个月后当选巴基斯坦总理，而大选却因拖延和广泛的操纵选票指控而受到损害
item.description:
Shehbaz Sharif elected Pakistan prime minister nearly a month after a general election marred by delays and widespread allegations of vote-rigging https://t.co/KbWZgajFjg

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 3, 2024

item.title: 拜登今天签署了一项临时法案，使之成为法律，以避免政府部分关门，但华盛顿下周将面临另一个最后期限
item.description:
Biden signs a stopgap bill into law to avert a partial government shutdown today, but Washington faces another deadline next weekhttps://t.co/iGvBNyOV9X

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 1, 2024

item.title: 据熟悉计划的人士透露，拜登预计将宣布美国将向加沙空投人道主义援助和物资

item.title: 与鲍勃-梅嫩德斯参议员一同被起诉的一名新泽西商人认罪，并在贿赂案中与当局合作

item.title: 美国疾病控制与预防中心（CDC）表示，Covid-19 感染者不再需要例行隔离 5 天，这意味着一种用于平息感染的策略已不再适用。
item.description:
The CDC says people with Covid-19 no longer need to routinely isolate for 5 days, in a move away from one strategy used to quell infections https://t.co/q2wGGFyPgM

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 1, 2024

item.title: 特朗普在佛罗里达州出庭参加听证会，这可能会推迟他在机密文件案中的审判日期。请关注实时更新。
